title: Where is mystery champion
body: Hello been a league player for a while and it's kind of a dumb question but...Where is the mystery champion shard located in shop i couldn't find it since the new project missions started :(

replies.body:
I've got some slightly bad news for you... :(

The Mystery Champion tokens aren't in the store anymore. They were part of the Essence Emporium content that ended a couple of days ago. I'm also not totally sure when Mystery Champion tokens will be back or if it'll be back when the Emporium rolls around again.
